title: Personalized Learning Path for Graphic Design Beginners
description: This learning path is designed for beginners with no prior knowledge in graphic design who prefer to learn through reading materials and note-taking. The path will introduce fundamental concepts and skills in graphic design to help you kickstart your journey in this creative field.
goals: Understand the basic principles of graphic design
Learn essential design software tools and techniques
